effect_entries.short_effect: Sell for 700 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 1400 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.text:
きれいな　銀色に　光る
少し　ちいさめの　真珠。
ショップで　安く　売れる。

A rather small pearl that has a
very nice silvery sheen to it.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

Perla piuttosto piccola dai graziosi riflessi
argentei. Si può vendere a un prezzo piuttosto
basso nei negozi.

Brillante perla pequeña y plateada que no alcanza
un buen precio en las tiendas.

Eine relativ kleine Perle, die in schönem
Silber funkelt. Sie ist von geringem Wert.

Une petite perle qui brille d’une jolie couleur
argent. Peut être vendue à bas prix aux magasins.

예쁜 은색으로 빛나는
자그마한 진주.
상점에서 싸게 팔린다.

きれいな　ぎんいろに　ひかる
すこし　ちいさめの　しんじゅ。
ショップで　やすく　うれる。

A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

Une petite perle qui brille d’une jolie
couleur argent. Peut être vendue
à bas prix aux magasins.

A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

A relatively small pearl that
sparkles in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply.

A pretty pearl
that would sell at a
cheap price.

A pretty pearl.
Can be sold cheaply.
